class1.name: ACCTIS100  INTRODUCTORY FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING
class1.description: Examines generally accepted accounting principles for measurement and reporting of financial information in a balance sheet, income statement, and statement of cash flows; introduction to analysis and interpretation of financial accounting data for decision-making purposes.
class1.requisite: Requisites: Not open to students with credit for ACCTIS300

class2.requisite: Requisites: Not open to students with credit for ACCTIS300
